website_summaries.verdict: It's about the same price as the Baby Relax, but that model has more to offer – choose it instead if you want the best.
pros: Has a high back and lumbar pillow for extra support
cons: The cushioning is somewhat firm, and the gliding mechanism is on the noisy side
It also doesn't recline like the Baby Relax model

website_summaries.verdict: A superb glider and ottoman set that is attractive, plush, and built to last.
pros: Sold in a variety of eye-catching polyester upholstery colors
Glider includes a high back with lumbar pillow for extra lower back support
Glider's metal base allows for a smooth and gentle 360-degree swivel motion and forward and backward gliding
cons: Back angle is in an awkward spot, which can sometimes make it tough to get comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Do your pregnant wife a favor and buy this chair
customer_reviews.text: My pregnant wife is in love with this chair. I'll be in the family room, mindlessly brushing my teeth and watching TV, and I'll hear a strange sound coming from the baby's room. She's in there, rocking on the chair and brushing her teeth. What's really great about this chair, is that I'm 6'-2", 225 lbs. and I fit comfortably in it. The back is high enough that my head doesn't have to lay way back like slow-motion whiplash. Now, if I can just time my tooth-brushing so I can nab the chair before her...
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin L. Frentzel

customer_reviews.title: This glider/ottoman combo is set at a good price point and is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This glider/ottoman combo is set at a good price point and is very comfortable. I'm really happy with it! It looks great in our daughter's nursery and I am sure it will be used for years to come. It doesn't have that "baby's room glider" look so we can re-use this chair when she's out of the night nursing/bedtime story age. My husband and I are both fairly short, 5'4" and 5'7", but for us the back is plenty tall enough for leaning back and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Baskette

customer_reviews.title: Not the same glider that it was 3 years ago.
customer_reviews.text: We bought our first Da Vinci olive glider about 3 years ago when we had our first son. We just bought a second (we are having twins) and the quality is terrible. The chair itself is narrower, the arms are narrower, it’s stiff, upright, and generally uncomfortable. We bought our original one because both my husband and I are tall (I’m 5’9” and he is 6’2”) and wanted to rest our heads on it, which we easily could. The new one barely comes to my neck, which negates the purpose. This is not the same glider that has 5 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: lporter

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, easy assembly and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough how much we love this glider! Delivery was easy, and setup was a breeze since it's shipped already assembled. My husband did need help getting it up the stairs since it was 100 pounds. Overall, it's comfy and great quality for the price. Our baby hasn't come yet, but we have both spent several hours sitting in it and have no complaints. (I'm 5'3 and my husband is 6'3 for reference).
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky noise and Unreliable product - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product starts squeaking just around the time your return window ends. Both seller and amazon does not care for their customers. I filed a claim and the seller denied it just because it does not fit in their policy. Who cares about policies when he product has a manufacturing defect. NEVER buy this on amazon. This will be good just for few weeks and starts falling apart very soon. There are many better glider chairs out there. Seller is cheating customers by making cheap quality CHINA products and selling them for parents of Infants. This is unfair and deceptive. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Sunny m.

customer_reviews.title: If you are hesitant, JUST BUY IT.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this chair! I debated getting it for a very long time. I finally decided to go for it when it went on sale. It also had great reviews so I figured, why not. I am SO glad that I went with this one. It is incredibly comfortable, the perfect size, and it comes with an ottoman. I know some people don't like that the ottoman doesn't rock, but I prefer it this way. I feel I have more control over the rocking when the ottoman is still. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Faten

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color of this chair but hesitated on it's purchase as it looked like it could be uncomfortable. There was a floor model at both buybuybaby & Babies R Us... they were both incredibly comfortable to sit it! I'm still waiting to rock my baby in the chair, but my husband and I have both spend time relaxing in the chair already. I'm 5'2 and he's 5'11, the height of the back fits of us comfortably. I would only warn that it doesn't allow for much width so if you're a slightly larger person this chair might not work well for you especially if you add a nursing pillow to the mix for feedings.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: A well-made comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made chair with comfort, stability, and solidity held to a high standard. It is comfortable to sit in and does not creak when you sit in it or rock in it. The rocking mechanism is a solid-base lever system so that no part of the rocking has the base leave the ground which means there are no easily accessible pinch or crush points. (This is great news for our cats!) My wife really enjoys this chair and spends many an evening reading while nestled comfortably in it.
customer_reviews.author: David Keadle

customer_reviews.title: This chair works well for first few weeks, but ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair works well for first few weeks, but now it starts making noise while I rock on it. Also the fabrics started to get a little peeling as well. At this rate, i do not think it will last more than a year of everyday usage.
customer_reviews.author: WinWin

customer_reviews.title: Great for shorter people
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. I bought it for my daughters nursery. I’ve been using this for about 2.5 months now. I wake up frequently to nurse her and fine this chair to be the perfect size. I’m only 5ft tall and I can comfortably reach the floor to rock her. It’s narrow so it helps support my daughter while nursing. I love how it swivels and rocks. It’s made w nice soft fabric and looks adorable. I didn’t care for the pillow it comes with I had to use my own and I wish the ottoman also rocked. Other than those minor things we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Peoples

customer_reviews.title: happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and a nice quality chair! The size is normal, not oversized; however, my son and husband are 6+ feet tall and find it very comfortable. I was looking for an affordable white or gray glider for my daughter's lavender & gray nursery. The color says cream...it is a more of a very light, neutral khaki tone. It looks great. Best part was it came assembled! Pulled it out of the box and put it in place. I would it buy again. Just note the delivery options if you have stairs.
customer_reviews.author: L. Canty

customer_reviews.title: Decent chair, but clicks during rocking
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast, and it was nice the chair came already assembled. It was a lot smaller than I was expecting and seemed a little cheap for the price. It's pretty comfortable, but the ottoman seems lightweight and flimsy. The biggest problem was a clicking sound that happend halfway through the rocking arc when we sat in it and I could feel it in the seat as well. I emailed amazon@milliondollarbaby.zendesk.com based on other reviewers who had problems with the chair and the manufacturer suggested they reach out to help solve the problem but no one emailed back. No choice left but to return the chair to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Morlan

customer_reviews.title: First impressions are great
customer_reviews.text: My first impression of this chair is that it is great! We haven't gotten a chance to use it yet, since the baby isn't here yet, but I do find myself going to the room to sit and rock while looking around his nursery. The chair has a very nice gliding motion and spins all the way around. The ottoman does not rock, but this doesn't bother me. My husband is 6'4" and finds it to be comfortable as well. It definitely provides enough head support even for him. I cannot wait to use it on a daily basis! Can't speak to durability or ease of cleaning since we haven't had it long enough, but I'm hoping it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfy!
customer_reviews.text: The chair is great value for the price. the chair came pre-assembled but the shipping box was literally falling apart. thankfully the chair seemed fine but word of caution. The chair is nice, you don't sink into it as much as other plush chairs, we like that but i know for some others it might be an issue. the color is very accurate. The ottoman is lightweight and easy to move around, but that also means it wont stay in place as i am constantly readjusting it while using it. It recently started to squeak, it was quiet when we first got it but after about a week it started to squeak a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: After owning it for less then a month the rocking mechanism broke! Now when moving backwards and forward, it feels like you are banging against a metal part or the mechanism. It’s also not comfortable, and the fabric feels cheap and is abrasive to your skin. Save yourself money and a headache, and spend the extra money for something that’s of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: TherapistYid

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Nursing Chair: Comfortable, Smooth and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical that for the price, this chair was going to be as nice as I was hoping for nursing my new baby. I was pleasantly surprised when I received it in a big box, all in one piece with no assembly required. It is very comfortable and the back is high enough to comfortable rest my head, which I was worried about. The arms are the perfect height to rest my elbow on while holding my baby, not needing a nursing pillow or anything else. I have only had it a few months, but there is no squeaking and it rocks and turns perfectly smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: LOUD
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews and this chair seemed to be exactly what we needed for our daughter's nursery. The chair came and it is LOUD. We must have gotten a defective one, or something, because we can't even move in it without it making a large thudding cracking noise. I don't have the luxury of being able to just buy another chair, so we are returning this one. It's too bad, because it seems otherwise like it would work well. The ottoman is a great touch. I'm unwilling to take the risk of receiving a replacement and experiencing the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Becky H

customer_reviews.title: Not for those over 5'5
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant because of the number of reviews saying it wasn't very tall. Unfortunately, I bought it anyway. I am 5'9" and only half of my head rests on the back when I put it back - not great for nodding off while rocking a baby. The ottoman not rocking is very strange - there is no point in having it if it won't rock. It is a bit stiff - but perhaps it will get more comfortable the longer we have it. Overall, I wish we had gone with something different.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Todd

customer_reviews.title: Noisiest Chair Ever
customer_reviews.text: So many great reviews, wondering if we just got one that squeaks like a house built in 1804 ever time you rock back and forth. It's also quite tight for me as a 6'2", 240 guy, and the throw in support pillow is trash, we never use it. The 3 month old baby doesn't seem to care much but as she gets older this chair will be pretty useless for rocking her to sleep. Plus up a star for the fact it comes fully assembled, and the material feels pretty comfortable despite the limitations mentioned above. Wouldn't buy again, put a few more dollars towards something of quality you can try out in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Need this for your nursery!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this chair! Came fully assembled and my husband easily got it up the stairs with a dolly in the box. This chair is so comfortable and the ottoman is a great feature to prop your legs on. I’m 5’4 and the chair supports my low back and I could easily fall in it. My husband is 6’ft and he was surprised how nice the quality of the chair was and how comfortable. It’s worth the splurge! It does produce a bit of off gassing so give yourself a week to open the window during the day to air out the chemical smell of new furniture.
customer_reviews.author: K. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Cute,Compact and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a few weeks I came back to update my review and added 1 star. This glider looks very nice and is very compact. Its good for small spaces but smaller than the standard wooden nursery glider in all respects. I didnt think it would be comfortable to nurse a baby in but it is surprisingly very comfortable. The lumbar support pillow takes some getting used to. I didn't like it at first but really like it now. The undersides of the glider look really scuffed when it arrived, I wonder if this was used and returned. I'm not returning it because its so bulky. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings. But no quality issues
customer_reviews.text: The whole item comes in one box. Already assembled. In a way great but makes lugging it over stairs tricky. Best roll it up the stairs in the box. Was not happy seeing the CA prop 65 cancer warning as . Great to know but disturbing to see it on a mom n baby furniture. Anyway. Since the furniture does not recline, it does feel restricted. But the overall small footprint of the chair and the ottoman, makes it ideal for small spaces. No quality issues found so far. Relatively happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sri

customer_reviews.title: Ant Hill Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Product came to my door mostly assembled. All I had to do was place it and unwrap it all. It was delivered to my side door. No issues with this other than, Amazon delivered it on top of an ant hill. So by the time I got to it, ants were literally EVERYWHERE! That's my one complaint. Nothing bad about the product itself. It's comfortable, quiet, slim design fits nicely in my living room. I'm 5'5", 185lbs and I am comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Whitsel

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that for this price this chair would be comfortable/stylish, but now that I'm spending a good amount of time on this chair after the birth of my child, I am very happy with this purchase. It looks great and it feels great as well. As other reviews say, the ottoman does not glide, but I actually prefer this. The back is sloped kinda far backwards, but with pillow placement, it does not make breastfeeding difficult. It is a bit narrower than I expected, but for small nurseries it is perfect. The fabric feels great and the gliding is very smooth. I would definitely recommend this to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: awneaz

customer_reviews.title: This Chair is perfect for a smaller space/person
customer_reviews.text: I love how petite this chair is! It is perfect for a smaller nursery! It is so quiet and glides so smoothly. I am 5 ft and 130lbs and I have a full hand size on each side when I sit. BEWARE this does not recline!! And I’m okay with it. The arms are a little lower than on other chairs but they are still able to give support.
customer_reviews.author: cawsmiles

customer_reviews.title: Different colors are different sizes
customer_reviews.text: We had bought this chair in cream color a few years back when our daughter was born. We loved it so much we wanted to get it again for our son, but this time in grey. It is not the same chair. The grey chair is significantly smaller than the cream chair, more narrow and the back is not as high. If it wasn’t so heavy we would return it. They should make that more clear in the description
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our nursery
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this chair at this point since the beginning of September 2016, so we’ll over a year. It’s still in great shape and believe me, I spent a LOT of time in it with my daughter those first few months. Now we usually just read books before bed but it doesn’t squeak or anything and I think it’s super comfortable. I’m 5’6” but my husband is 6’2” and he doesn’t have any issues with it either. Yes, I would have preferred an ottoman that also glides but for this price I really don’t mind and after having this for a year I don’t think it makes a big difference! Everyone who sees it really likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A

customer_reviews.title: great for small nursery
customer_reviews.text: I did a TON of research trying to find the best glider for our itty bitty nursery, and it definitely paid off. This chair is perfect! It has great head/neck support, and comes with a small pillow for lumbar support. I also like how it has arms, which have helped support me while holding baby in the middle of the night. I was not going to go without having an ottoman, and the fact that it's included in the price makes this set a great bargain. The chair comes already assembled, too! The chair glides, rocks and swivels, and so far, it's been very quiet and comfortable. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair has been nothing but a headache. We purchased it for the baby’s nursery over a year ago. It constantly makes either a banging or squeaking noise. We contacted the company and they sent us out a whole new swivel/glider base. This worked for about a month and it started making the same noises as the old one. Do yourself a favor and do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable - More than it looks!
customer_reviews.text: Pros - I've used this chair for 5 months and it is very comfortable for nursing. The gliding motion is multi-directional, smooth, and quiet. It's also very sturdy. I've never missed having a reclining feature or rocking ottoman. Cons - The one heads up on this chair is that it comes fully assembled, which means it's big and heavy. It took my neighbor and husband to get into our house and carry it upstairs to our nursery while I was pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, great company, great service
customer_reviews.text: My baby and I can sit very comfortably in this chair. However it recently began to make a grinding noise and you can feel the friction when we rock in it. That was not the case in the beginning and we’ve have this chair less than six months. My husband flipped it over to see if something broke but everything looks fine underneath. I don’t think we’re exceeding the weight limit. Baby and I are a combined weight of 144 lbs. EDIT: I contacted the company and the issue has been resolved. FANTASTIC customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa P.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The chair came fully assembled and was not as heavy or bulky as I imagined. My husband and I were able to maneuver it upstairs into our nursery no problem. The fabric is really nice and the included lumbar pillow is a nice touch. The chair looks more narrow than it feels when sitting in it. The only criticism would be that I find myself wishing the included ottoman rocked as well. Overall, great chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for....
customer_reviews.text: The chair fits perfectly in our new nursery. The color is exactly as described and I like that the ottoman doesn't move. I admit I wasn't going to give 5 stars, but the customer service from the seller (Haus Appeal) was excellent. The chair took longer than expected and then we experienced some mixed messages between amazon and Haus Appeal, but they made it right, and that is all that matters. I would recommend them to friends and family! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging and no set up required
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing purchase of ours for the nursery. My Wife and I were looking for inexpensive chair for the nursery since so many of our friends had advised they overspent on their chairs and didn't use them as much as they thought they would. The packaging was great and the set up was a breeze. Open it up and put the chair where you like it. It was that simple. The fabric is soft and the rocking motion is extremely smooth. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gilson

customer_reviews.title: We love this glider and ottoman
customer_reviews.text: We love this glider and ottoman! It arrived fully assembled so, although it was heavy to get upstairs, there was nothing to put together. It's of good quality and I love that it doesn't have flame retardants. It does not have a toxic chemical smell, so that's a huge plus in my book! It looks great in our nursery and is very comfortable (and quiet when rocking). I cannot wait for my little guy to be here and spend countless hours rocking him in this!
customer_reviews.author: nickeyd

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this chair. It took me forever to make a decision as I was replacing a new rocking chair that just wasn’t working (very uncomfortable for long hours with a newborn). I’m so happy I finally bought it. Now, my mega long nursing sessions were over by the time I ordered & received the chair but it looks really nice and is really comfortable. I wish we had bought something a little nicer like this for our toddlers room. Buy a decent chair, you’ll spend a lot of time in it!
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Hope you have better luck.
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like that the back support felt spongy and I couldnt get situated while trying to rock. Which leads me to it rocks not glides. And minutes after taking it from the box it starting making a noise so we sent it back the next day. Wasnt worth $300 to have it make a noise everytime I used it. The chair is smaller, with a more cozy than roomy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, nice size for small nursery
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice chair that required no assembly and is comfortable. I really like that the ottoman doesn't move - gives you something to stabilize yourself with when you're rocking/swiveling in the chair. Also serves as a nice thing to set clothes/things on when you're not using as an ottoman. Color is nice. The small pillow is pretty useless, but we didn't purchase the chair for the pillow so it's not a big deal. I'd recommend this for a smaller nursery (and smaller people). I'm 5'4" and it's good for me - husband is 5'9" and works for him too. Any bigger and you might not be as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: RosieD123

customer_reviews.title: My favorite rocking chair!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived fast and on time! I got the grey and we love it and it is so neutral. Easy to clean and put together. We’ve had for 8ish months now and it has held up well with also having a 5 and 2 year old climbing all over. I wouldn’t say it’s the most comfortable rocking chair/glider I’ve ever sat in but it’s definitely not uncomfortable at all. With the price, you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy23

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair about a year ago, and wanted to review it now that I have used it for a while. It is a great product. The glider looks great, is easy to clean, and is much more comfortable than it looks. I am very happy with this purchase. I do wish that the ottoman could rock as well, but I am happy with this set. No assembly required, though it is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great chair at a great price. The chair looks surprisingly upscale and wouldn't be out of place in our living room. The glider is really nice and the chair is very comfortable. The baby is still a week or so away but we find ourselves sitting in the nursery in this chair just because it's comfortable. I believe a similar or the same chair sells for $400 at Babies R Us. Have someone other than your pregnant wife around to get this chair into the house. Its not light and its awkward but fits through normal doorways fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Les Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for small space
customer_reviews.text: We got this seat because we have small bedrooms. This is as compact a chair we could find and it fits in our space. Some of the reviews say it's stiff, but I don't find this to be true. It came already assembled and the rock/swivel is nice a smooth. The ottoman is fine. Nothing to write home about. The fabric is soft, but nothing fancy. Seems like it will be easy to clean. I would recommend for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this chair. My only complaint is that I cannot recline the chair at all and that the ottoman is not moveable. I would prefer an ottoman that can be stationary to rock. I do love this chair though. Very well made and priced well. I am extremely happy that the back of the chair is high enough to rest my head against.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice chair for a nursery
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice chair for a nursery. I like that the back is tall so you can rest your head without it hanging over the top. The ottoman does not glide, but that is not a feature that I wanted. The chair is firm, but very comfortable. I have not had it very long, but the fabric seems high quality. The chair came completely assembled, just had to take it out of the box and it was ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: RC28

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, defective pillow
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this chair online and delivery was quick. The quality of the chair is great, however, the pillow was defective. The zipper on the side is completely broken and we are unable to fit it. My husband and I both agree that the chair is pretty comfortable and looks very cute in our little girl's room. It's a little frustrating because we are unable to request a pillow replacement without having to replace the whole chair. So I guess we are stuck with this defective pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day for 14 months
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a comfy good looking glider for our nursery with out breaking the bank. This delivered as the other reviews say. I have been using it since day 0 and every single day since my daughter was born, is very sturdy, comfortable, modern looking and surprisingly doesn't take that much space. In the picture is my husband, he's very tall 6.4 and still find it very comfy and yes there's a dog in there too :P
customer_reviews.author: Graciela Leal

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for rocking, reading and passing out with babe
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so comfy. Ive used it for about 8 months now for baby feeding, book reading and sometimes a quick nap. its narrow for small spaces but the seat area is big. It has large arm rests and comes with a long pillow which is perfect for resting your arm while cradling babe. The ottomon does not rock, its basically just a big rectangle but it works 🙂 I like that when babe gets older, I can probably put it in the living room and it wont look like its from the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure who has written most of the reviews, but this chair is not comfy enough and not big enough. I'm tall and skinny and this chair cannot be good fit for someone like me or bigger. Maybe for tiny girls. And probably for small rooms. DO NOT RECOMMEND IT AT ALL!
customer_reviews.author: Armun

customer_reviews.title: Loud squeaking noise with every rock = Wide awake baby
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this chair if you are looking for one that will last more than a few months. It worked great a first, but after a few months, it started to squeak extremely loud with every rock. You can also hear a grinding noise when rocking. At this point, the chair is unusable because it is so loud and keeps my baby awake. I wrote to customer service explaining the problem and asked for replacement parts, but did not receive a reply. This chair is not worth $300 when it stops working properly after a few months of use. I'd recommend finding another chair because this one doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfortable and a good size
customer_reviews.text: I love this rocker! It’s a beautiful, neutral color and arrived fully assembled in perfect condition. The material is very soft and the chair itself is comfortable but firm. I personally love the lumbar support pillow and that the ottoman is stationary (makes it easier to rock yourself). It is not a huge chair so it fits nicely in the nursery without taking up too much room but my husband and I can both sit comfortably in it for a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: N H

customer_reviews.title: New favorite chair
customer_reviews.text: We adore this chair. We got it for our new baby to comfortably nurse and it's a dream. Everyone wants to sit in this chair. It glides and swivels smoothly, looks great, and required no assembly. I love that it's so easy to clean too. My LO spits up a lot and this chair still looks new. My only complaint is that the ottoman doesn't glide.
customer_reviews.author: castastrophe

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and noisy
customer_reviews.text: This cake assembled which is great. However, the quality is so poor. I can feel the springs in the seat. I also can’t rock in it because it makes noise and wakes the baby. I wish I would have spent a little more for a better mad glider
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long!
customer_reviews.text: It comes already assembled. It is comfortable enough. Within a couple months the back starting squeaking really badly. And the back felt like it could break almost. And less than a year later the rocking part feels like it is going to break too. It is definitely cheaply made. Maybe I got a bad one because the reviews are pretty good. But it probably won't last much longer. Might get a year out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Glider Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect for breastfeeding! The pillow it comes with offers great support for my little dude's sometimes long-winded feeds. He has reflux and I'm able to tip way back while I feed him to make his symptoms better. He also hates rocking back and forth and prefers side to side movement which I can also accomplish in this chair. So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: dmcnn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great! I wish I had purchased a long time ago. Very comfortable, tall enough to rest my head, the arm rests are good support for nursing, and the rock/turn/glide feel very smooth! It also is compact for small spaces without feeling like it’s too small to be comfortable. I also like that the ottoman is stationary, the rocking ones annoy me! I wish I’d bought a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: Incredible glider!
customer_reviews.text: I love this glider!! It is so comfortable and is a perfect size. I'm in a small apartment and so I was looking for a rocker that would fit in my space. This product has been perfect for what I needed! My husband and I are tall and it still works like a charm. My son falls asleep while I rock him in it too! I seriously have nothing bad to say about it, I am very very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Haywalt

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like at first but once baby came and we started using it found out ITS GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I literally never write reviews but feel like this product deserved one. To be honest I initially felt like it was very uncomfortable. But I gave it a chance and it has been the perfect chair for nursing my daughter. I use the little pillow it comes with to put under my arm which works perfectly. I love how it rocks smoothly and swivels. The foot rest is perfect for when I want to put my legs up and hold my daughter. All around perfect nursing rocker!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Plante

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chair, great quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this chair for about a month and a half now and absolutely love it. Was so glad I splurged on this instead of getting on the less expensive gliders with the attached ottoman. This chair is high quality, well made and will likely last for years to come. The chair is super comfortable and the gliding motion is smooth. I have fallen asleep in this chair many times after feeding my baby. Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis B.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We got this chair as a gift after we adopted our son. We needed a rocker with good back support. It came quickly and completely assembled so all we had to do was remove the box. Very comfy and looks great. The seat is a bit small, so don't expect to curl up in it for a nap or long stretches of time, but it is a great rocker and sits comfortably. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bekpeeps

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice chair but it doesn't fit me well
customer_reviews.text: Update: I bought this chair when I was pregnant and it wasn’t that comfortable at that time. However now that I’m nursing it feels much better. I’ve tried other chairs nursing and this one definitely beats the others. Only thing I would knock it for is that the ottoman is too lightweight and moves too easily when using it. Old: It's a nice chair but it doesn't fit me well. I'm 5'7 and it feels too small to sit in. Also doesn't support my head unless I scoot down. I have back issues and this chair is difficult to sit in. Hopefully it will feel more comfortable once I have the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Syl

customer_reviews.title: If you like squeaky chairs...
customer_reviews.text: If you like squeaky rocking chairs this ones for you. My mom got me this for my baby shower and I had to send it back for a replacement because the base squeaked every time I rocked it. After a couple weeks of light use the second one is now squeaky, but this time it’s the backing of the chair. It’s very disappointing because I use this a lot during bed time and feeding time with my baby, and the sound is annoying when I’m trying to relax. 2 stars because I like the way it looks. Too bad they’re not made well, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kimia

customer_reviews.title: Good glider, excellent manufacturer customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair almost a year ago. I liked it because it had a high back and ottoman included for a reasonable price. Several months after having my baby, the chair began to squeak at the base when rocking and creaking (wood) in the back of the chair. We contacted the manufacturer, and they helped us obtain a new chair. Although the new chair is the wrong color, we were so grateful for a functioning chair and excellent customer service. The new chair is still working great!
customer_reviews.author: Alainaisabella25

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for nursery
customer_reviews.text: 3 months into using this chair everyday dozens of times a day. It’s comforable and durable. I’m very short and my husband is tall and this chair is comfortable for the both of us. I generally don’t mind that the ottoman doesn’t move, but sometimes I wish it did. Wasn’t a deal breaker for me though. Beautiful chair, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Literally our best purchase
customer_reviews.text: Pre baby you have all these list of things to buy. A comfortable chair was on a lot of these so me and my wife tried this one. We both agree out of everything we bought this was by far the best. Its so dam comfortable , comes assembled and its used every single day. Wish I had more of them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Frasier

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, Cute, Slight New/Chemical Smell
customer_reviews.text: This chair was everything I was hoping for! It fits perfect in my nursery and is comfy too! I do feel as if the chair is a little crooked, but other than that, it’s great! The chair does have a new chair/chemical smell to it. It’s not too bad, but is why I gave it 4 stars! Perfect chair to get for a nursery with a registry discount! Also, I’m not sure what the “Without Expert Assembly” means, but don’t pay extra. The chair comes fully assembled and we did NOT pay extra!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany R

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on rockers/gliders and settled on this one - thankfully, I really like this chair. My baby is almody a month old and I use it daily. The arm rests are a nice height for support during feedings, the ottoman is sturdy enough to use to rock/swivel, the back is tall enough to rest my head (although I scoot down into the chair most of the time), and it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chair!
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as I thought it would based on the pictures. I was able to purchase this with our registry completion discount, and it came fully assembled and ready to set up in the nursery! Both husband and I both find the chair to be extremely comfortable. The way that it rocks/glides so smoothly without bouncing will help tremendously with putting our little one to sleep. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie B.

customer_reviews.title: Chair = Great, Ottoman = OK
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable gliding chair. Doesn't squeak and no "springy" sounds....in other words, it is very quiet. The only reason I lopped off one star is because the ottoman rocks because the legs aren't even. I had to put a few playing cards under one of the legs to stop it from "clicking" as I rocked with my legs up.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: Daily use for 7 months works great
customer_reviews.text: We love the look of this in our baby's nursery. We got this as a gift at our baby shower. We have used it every day for 7 months and it still looks very nice. Our daughter has spit up and drooled on it and it comes out fine. I will say my husband and I are both small so we dont usually do a lot of wear and tear to furniture. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Massingill

customer_reviews.title: First Online Chair Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This chair and Ottoman so far has exceeded my expectations! It came fully assembled and works as advertised. It is comfortable and provides good back support. The swivel is a great feature as I use it where I operate 3 large computer screens and I am frequently switching from one to the other and being able to swivel is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RR in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair to rock my new granddaughter in. It is very comfortable, and since I spend several hours a day in it that is important. It seems well made and I have not noticed any defects in workmanship or problems with the glider. There was no assembly required on the chair either. I would buy this chair again.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Maerki

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: This glider is a fantastic option for a new nursery. The chair is quite modern and is made of quality material. The gliding mechanism works smoothly, the chair has the right amount of support and cushion and the ottoman helps one sit back and relax. This makes a perfect addition to any nursery and you should feel comfortable knowing it is a quality product for a great price
customer_reviews.author: MitoMan

customer_reviews.title: IT SQUEAKS
customer_reviews.text: Although the chair and material are great and it does come full assembled, IT SQUEAKS. It is unbelievably annoying and wish we had gotten another chair. And, the squeak comes from the back of the chair, there is no way to oil it, short of ripping a hole in the back which I have seriously considered given level of annoyance the squeak creates. Save yourself from the squeaks and buy a different chair.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a good quality reasonably priced rocker for a nursery
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for 8 months with my baby now. I was looking for a good quality reasonably priced rocker for a nursery. I find the wood gliders with cushions ugly, wanted something a little more modern/chair like. This chair has been great-many hours spent nursing a baby in it. I'm 5'1 and can easily lean back. My husband is 6 feet and is also comfortable. The upholstery is holding up-wipes clean easily. The only down side is that it seems to be a magnet for pet hair- we have a black dog and the cream chair so it's quite noticable. It's also super heavy and awkward to move for cleaning/to a different room.
customer_reviews.author: Bdh91494

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Nursery Chair
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this chair for my son's nursery. We wanted something that didn't break the bank (nursery furniture is pricey!), was on the smaller side, and was comfortable. This chair met all of those needs, and we're very happy with the purchase. Extra bonus was the included ottoman - it is stationary, but it's nice to be able to just put your feet up. I was hesitant to buy furniture online without getting to sit on it first, but it was worth the risk for us!
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great chair for the price! I have been using it now for three months and both my husband and I love it. The pillow is great for lower back support and it’s very comfortable. Took one star off because the material is a little cheaper feeling than I expected but is holding up really well with daily use. Really can’t beat the quality and price for this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST chair , AMAZING value
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a chair for our master bedroom for the nights we had to rock baby in there. But something also not to fluffy for my husband if he ever sat in it to do a zoom meeting etc. We returned two other chairs before trying this one, and THIS IS AMAZING!!! Comfortable, supportive, looks great, bonus ottoman and pillow, we are in love with this chair. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: tanya b

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chair! So so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this chair. I was so indecisive about a chair and almost bought the recliner version of this chair but I am so glad we went with this one. Its comfortable and having the foot rest is SO worth it! I would never recommend a nursery chair without that! The only thing I didn't care for was the pillow thus comes with but i just set that to the side. Comes fully assembled!
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in great condition, it's comfy and both my husband and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this chair delivered. Arrived in great condition, it's comfy and both my husband and I like it (5'3" and 6'0")
customer_reviews.author: Mishelly

customer_reviews.title: Clunks and squeaks - not good for rocking baby to sleep
customer_reviews.text: The smaller size is great for the small nursery space that we have. However, now that baby has arrived and we are using it, it is so loud. With each rock there is an annoying squeak and terribly loud clunking sound - makes it hard to peacefully soothe baby to sleep. I’m quite disappointed in the chair because of this fact. I know other reviewers had complained about this as well but was hoping it wouldn’t be there or would be just a small squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Brouwer, APRN, CNM

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for a nursery
customer_reviews.text: I received this item as a baby shower gift. It is perfect for a nursery. The back is high enough for myself and my husband (6' 3") to rest our heads comfortably. The footstool does not rock. The chair rocks and swivels easily. It is a narrow chair, but it makes breastfeeding easy and the arm rests supports my nursing pillow perfectly. I have spent many hours in this chair and would absolutely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: RebekahV

customer_reviews.title: Top quality chair for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of the quality of this when we bought it. Rockers at other baby stores are so expensive. However I honestly think the quality of this is better than many of the rockers that are twice as much. It is a bit heavy to move into the house but not having g to assemble anything was really nice. The glide is nice and smooth and the quality of the fabric is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mota

customer_reviews.title: Nice glider for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glider! We are using this in our nursery and it's not too big so it doesn't take up a lot of space in smaller rooms, but it's big enough to be comfortable. The back is high enough to support mine and my husband's head when we lay back. Only con for us is that the ottoman doesn't glide so it's a little awkward to use together if you want to rock.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal McD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Nursing
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. The combination of the included pillow and the arm rests make for the most perfect set up to nurse my newborn. It is definitely worth the money. Excellent quality and modern look. It looks great with my sofa.
customer_reviews.author: A.Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and compact
customer_reviews.text: This chair is wonderful. We are limited on space and it fits perfectly, while still being able to glide and turn. The pillow hits in an awkward spot so we took it off, but not a big deal. I love that I can sit in this chair and kick my feet up, while still being able to get up easily (hands full or not). The material of the chair is very soft and comfortable. Looking forward to many hours spent with my baby in this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Sas6f8

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, practical until it broke
customer_reviews.text: The glider and ottoman is very comfortable and just the right size. For the price point, we thought it was a great value. However after 3 months of use, the chair sits crooked at rest and makes a strong grinding and creaking sound as it rocks. At certain times, it gets stuck and won't swivel or rock at all! I do not recommend this chair bc it won't last very long. Edit: I reached out to the manufacturer and they sent out a replacement base for free. I swapped out the base and the chair works perfectly again. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair for the nursery
customer_reviews.text: My Husband purchased this chair for me for our daughters nursery. It's such a great chair, super comfortable and glides perfectly. Love it and so happy we purchased through Amazon as I saw the same chair at Baby's R Us without the ottoman for almost $50 more!
customer_reviews.author: Christina G

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great! I spent hours/days/weeks reviewing rocking chairs for our nursery. People leave so many negative reviews about everything, it is frustrating. This chair is very comfortable. I am 5'10" and my husband is 6'2" and this is comfy for us both and we can lean our head back and it's not super far back on the neck to where it's uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous purchasing a glider online however I am very happy with this purchase. My littles ones nursery is not that large and the glider fits perfect in the corner. My husband has a large frame and he feels the chair provides enough support and is comfortable. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TMarie

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again! Comfortable, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome!! Came fully assembled which made the quality very good to me. Super comfortable, we bought this for our daughter's nursery and while pregnant, I was over 300lbs and I felt fully supported the whole time. Rocks smoothly and the ottoman is comfy too. We have used this every night for 3 months now and its still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Deena Mirandola

customer_reviews.title: Must buy if you have a baby
customer_reviews.text: I should get this chair sooner! My back and shoulder were hurting because rocking my baby to sleep each day. And now I am able to relax on this chair when rocking her to sleep. The lumber pillow is prefect support to my back. I thought it was a little too firm at the beginning but I can comfortably sitting on it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Venus C.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and non toxic! I love this glider! It matches our nursery perfectly, comes assembled in the box, arrived sooner than expected, and is so comfy for both my husband and I. The only drawback is that you have to buy a gliding ottoman separately if you don’t want a stationary ottoman, but I’m happy just to have a place to put my feet up!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality glider for the nursery
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful glider. We got this as a gift for our nursery. It came together fully assembled. The gray fits well in our nursery and is very comfortable. It is soft but sturdy. The ottoman does not rock which I like because it makes rocking and propping up my legs easy. The chair swivels and rocks easily. Greatly quality chair that I believe will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed that I had to return it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mother-in-law, but she did not like it. Perhaps, because I ordered it. HaHa. There is nothing wrong with the chair except that my MIL did not like it. It was for her bedroom, for her to watch TV and I liked the quality and practicality of the chair and ottoman. My wife and I though it was perfect, but since she was the user, had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: EnriqueO

customer_reviews.title: Very Good to Great Quality! No Regrets of Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, very good to great quality! Nice that there wasn’t any assembly. Somewhat wished that the ottoman glided as well, but it serves it’s purpose nicely as a ottoman. I don’t regret my purchase. I really enjoy that the chair turns and glides which really makes up for the ottoman being stationary for me.
customer_reviews.author: So You Know!

customer_reviews.title: Expected more for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was encouraged by so many positive reviews, but pretty disappointed. The seat is small and feels very cramped, the fabric isn’t soft, and it just feels cheap. It doesn’t feel like it will last. For the price I could have gotten a much nicer piece of furniture - I found one for the same price at Target that is much higher quality. Unfortunately I didn’t realize that this seller didn’t offer free returns (figured if I went with Amazon I could return no problem) and it costs so much to ship the chair back that it’s not worth it. Guess I’m stuck with it now.
customer_reviews.author: fbixtyrrtdgob

customer_reviews.title: Higher back great for taller parents!
customer_reviews.text: Easily my favorite seat in the house right now asi spend a bit of time nursing my son there. It’s a bit stiff after unboxing, but that felt great on my back towards the end of the pregnancy. The seat is a bit more narrow than I was expecting, but still comfortable. The glider mechanism doesn’t seem as smooth as others I’ve tested, but the higher back is a rareity.
customer_reviews.author: NDNlegaldiva

customer_reviews.title: Good glider
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, with plenty of support -- even for my 200+ pound self. Arms are at a comfortable height.
customer_reviews.author: just bought this

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cheap glider for baby’s room
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our baby’s room, and as of now, still waiting for baby to arrive, but so far it’s super comfy and seems like it will do the job. We didn’t want to spend $1000 on a glider chair that we honestly wouldn’t use again after this, and this one is a good deal and much less offensive looking than some of those other gliders you see out there.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent glider chair!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this glider. My husband and I are both very tall (5'11'' and 6'1'') and this chair is PERFECT for us. It's not huge so great for a smaller sized room, yet is large enough to sit in comfortably even for those who are tall. We have this in our nursery and I'd recommend it to anyone. Excellent, well-built chair that looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

product_meta.title: DaVinci Olive Upholstered Swivel Glider with Bonus Ottoman in Cream, Greenguard Gold Certified
product_meta.description: The DaVinci Olive Glider with Ottoman has been thoughtfully designed to meet mom’s and baby’s feeding time needs then transition to your home in the later years. Mom can rest easy in this soft and durable 100% polyester glider that glides forwards and backwards as well as swivels. Bonus upholstered ottoman included to rest those tired feet. Designed with a high back for head and neck support. A matching lumbar pillow is included to offer even more back support when needed.
feature_bullets: GREENGUARD Gold Certified: This product has been tested for over 10,000 chemicals! It contributes to cleaner indoor air, creating a healthier environment for your baby to sleep, play and grow
DESIGNED FOR PARENT AND BABY: Metal base that allows for a smooth and gentle 360 degree swivel motion and forward and backward gliding so you can be comfortable as you feed or rock your baby to sleep
COMFORTABLE HEADREST: Being a parent is hard work! High back allows moms and dads to comfortably lean back for some much needed rest
INCLUDED OTTOMAN & LUMBAR PILLOW: Bonus lumbar pillow & ottoman included so that you can kick up your feet for ultimate comfort

FOR YOUR BABY'S SAFETY: Say goodbye to toxic chemicals! Upholstery is free of chemical flame retardants. Polybrominated Diphenyl Ethers (PBDEs) and Formaldehyde free. Meets all CA TB117-2013 flammability requirements

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars944 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
